Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 45th overall pick, by St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Charles Bodkin (COL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/14/2015, off Christopher Webb (MON)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/2015, hitting .400 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2015, hitting .295 with 10 HR, 30 RBI...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Won World Series with St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Won Gold Glove at First Base in 2015...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 4/19/2016...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/2016, hitting .615 with 5 HR, 17 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2016, hitting .341 with 11 HR, 29 RBI...
Injured on 6/12/2016 with a Tight Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove at First Base in 2016...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/2017, hitting .455 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/7/2017, hitting .435 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at First Base in 2017...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/2018, hitting .400 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/2019, hitting .462 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Hit 3 homeruns against Colorado, driving in 7 runs on 7/29/2019...
9/6/2019: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis (C), $14,250,000 per year, for 4 years.
Hit 3 homeruns against Philadelphia, driving in 7 runs on 9/13/2019...
Drove in 6 runs against Colorado on 6/26/2020...
